results.title: Mohammed Shami asked to appear for SIR hearing in Kolkata
results.description: Cricketer Mohammed Shami and his brother were asked to appear for SIR verification in Kolkata due to errors in their voter forms. Shami, representing Bengal in Rajkot, has requested new dates, rescheduled between January 9тАУ11 by the Election Commission
